flag.name: com.google.common.flags.Flags.forceIgnoreNonflagArguments
flag.doc: Emergency override Flags.parse()'s strictness: Ignore non-flag arguments instead of throwing an exception. For emergencies only: Instead of setting this flag, switch to parseAndReturnLeftovers() when possible.

flag.name: com.google.common.flags.Flags.showAllArgumentsForNonflagErrors
flag.doc: When Flags.parse() detects non-flag arguments, make the exception message include all arguments instead of only the non-flag arguments.
